duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide comprehensive clinical and organizational direction and leadership to the healthcare provider team in the care of patients.
Orders and interprets laboratory and diagnostic tests, and develops, implements, and evaluates treatment plans.
Acts as a clinical resource, providing education consistent with evidence-based practices and protocols.
Leads quality assurance initiatives, performance improvement, and benchmarking initiatives to advance patient care delivery.
Pursues opportunities for active engagement in research and the analysis of evidence-based practice.
Maintains professional licensure, certification, and practice agreements as required.

education_certification.credential: Master's Degree as an Advanced Practice Provider - Nurse Practitioner or Physician Assistant, with One to two years minimum experience as an Advanced Practice Provider Nurse Practitioner or Physician Assistant preferred.
